heroSection.title: Your Go-To Event Helpers in Dallas & Raleigh!
heroSection.description: With Host Easy, enjoy professional HostHands and Bartenders who take care of everything. Focus on your guests while we handle the rest!

description.caption: Enjoy your birthday parties, family reunions, bridal showers and more with our amazing party help.
We know what it’s like to simply host a great party. We know it can be stressful.
We’re here to help you be the best host you can be with Host Easy.

cards.title: Host-Hands
cards.description: Our Host-Hands handle the day-of tasks so you can focus on your guests. From pre-party setup, party service, and party cleanup, your Host-Hand is there to handle the details. Get back to hosting your guests and enjoying the party. Our Host-Hands will take care of the rest.

cards.title: Bartenders
cards.description: Our Bartenders serve up world-class beverages year-round. Have an idea for a custom cocktail for your event? We can make it happen. From pre-party prep to beverage service and cleanup, our bartenders always serve the best cocktails with a smile.

yourEventOurExpertiseSection.section_heading: Your Event, Our Expertise: The Host Easy Promise!

data.title: Simple
data.description: Fill out a form, make your payment, and we show up to help make your party happen. It’s that easy.

data.title: Effortless
data.description: Booking our Host-Hands means less hassle and more time to enjoy your event, with everything handled seamlessly.

data.title: Flexible
data.description: Need streamers hung? We got it. Need someone to operate a cotton candy machine? We did that (yes, really).

data.title: Trusted
data.description: All party helpers are professionally trained and background-checked. So you never have to worry about who you're working with!
